title: Honoring Matt and Steve Lazar upon the occasion of their designation as recipients of the Chamber Member of the Year Award
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION  honoring Matt and Steve Lazar upon the occasion
of their designation as recipients of the Chamber  Member  of  the  Year
Award by the Bellmore Chamber of Commerce

WHEREAS,  Individuals  who give of their time and energies and serve the
best interests of their communities are an asset beyond remuneration and
cannot be sufficiently extolled; and
  WHEREAS, Matt and Steve Lazar of Nature's Museum Store have given  not
only  of  their time and energies but also of their competence, intelli-
gence and leadership and consequently have been designated  for  special
recognition; and
  WHEREAS, This Legislative Body is justly proud to honor Matt and Steve
Lazar  upon the occasion of their designation as recipients of the Cham-
ber Member of the Year Award by the Bellmore Chamber of Commerce  to  be
celebrated at its Annual Installation Dinner on January 29, 2011; and
  WHEREAS,  Matt  and  Steve  Lazar  have been called upon to contribute
their time and talents to countless civic and charitable  endeavors  and
have always given of themselves unstintingly; and
  WHEREAS,  For the past 25 years, Matt and Steve Lazar along with their
family, have been the proprietors of a jewelry manufacturing business in
the Bellmores; recently, they opened a retail  store,  giving  them  the
opportunity to employ many members of their own community; and
  WHEREAS,  Matt  and Steve Lazar have volunteered much of their time to
the Bellmore Chamber of Commerce; in addition, throughout the year  they
have  generously  offered  their store as the venue for many fundraising
events for both the Chamber and other local organizations; and
  WHEREAS, Throughout the entire period of their  community  service,  a
period  of  constructive  involvement,  Matt  and Steve Lazar have stood
constant in dignity, good grace and humor; and
  WHEREAS, Rare indeed is the impressive dedication shown by individuals
for the benefit of others which Matt  and  Steve  Lazar  have  displayed
throughout their lives; and
  WHEREAS,  It  is  the  sense  of  this Legislative Body that those who
enhance the well-being and vitality of their community and have shown  a
long  and  sustained  commitment to excellence certainly have earned the
recognition and applause of all the citizens of this great Empire State;
now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED, That this Legislative Body pause  in  its  deliberations  to
honor Matt and Steve Lazar of Nature's Museum Store upon the occasion of
their  designation as recipients of the Chamber Member of the Year Award
by the Bellmore Chamber of Commerce; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Matt and Steve Lazar.
